patient_info: Facial edema,Impaired social interactions,Apathy,Hypothyroidism,Increased circulating prolactin concentration,Hyperpigmentation of the skin,Papilledema,Cirrhosis,Hepatosplenomegaly,Ascites,Pericardial effusion,Splenomegaly,Anemia,Fever,Dyspnea,Pleural effusion,Lymphadenopathy,Hypoproteinemia,Abdominal distention,EMG abnormality,Upper limb muscle weakness,Decreased body weight,Poor appetite,Abnormal intervertebral disk morphology,Anomalous splenoportal venous system,Foot dorsiflexor weakness,Pedal edema,Anasarca,Lower limb pain,Dysesthesia,Abnormal circulating thyroid hormone concentration,Monoclonal elevation of IgG
golden_diagnosis: POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome,POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. POEMS Syndrome (Polyneuropathy, Organomegaly, Endocrinopathy, Monoclonal protein, Skin changes)
2. Endocrine Hypothyroidism with Myxedema Coma and Associated Complications
3. Autoimmune Hepatitis with Cirrhosis and Portal Hypertension
4. Lymphoma with Splenic and Hepatic Involvement
5. Multiple Myeloma with Amyloidosis and Renal Involvement
6. Sarcoidosis with Multi-organ Dysfunction
7. Hemochromatosis with Endocrine and Hepatic Manifestations
8. Metastatic Carcinoma with Hypercalcemia and Endocrine Dysfunction
9. Chronic Inflammatory Demyelinating Polyneuropathy (CIDP) with Systemic Manifestations
10. Hereditary Hemorrhagic Telangiectasia (HHT) with Hepatic and Splenic Involvement

Please note that this list is speculative and based on the symptoms provided. A definitive diagnosis would require a thorough clinical evaluation, laboratory tests, imaging studies, and potentially a biopsy.
